# HTML Output Directory

This directory contains HTML statistics pages generated by pisg.

## Generated Files

- `index.html` - Main statistics page for #motorcycles
- Associated CSS/image files generated by pisg

## Access

The nginx container serves these files on port 8080.

## Generation Schedule

Statistics are regenerated every hour by the pisg container (configurable via `CRON_SCHEDULE` environment variable).

## Important Notes

- All files in this directory are gitignored except this README
- Files are automatically generated by the pisg container
- The nginx container mounts this directory read-only
- Cache is owned by UID 100 / GID 65533 (matches eggdrop container)
